Content.Text:
This is a pattern that will allow you to make outfits in
the Sewing Studio.

This is a pattern set that will allow you to make
outfits in the Sewing Studio.

This is a pattern that will allow you to make Spring
and Summer outfits in the Sewing Studio.

This is a pattern that will allow you to make Autumn
and Winter outfits in the Sewing Studio.

This is a pattern that will allow you to make hats in
the Sewing Studio.

This is a pattern that will allow you to make glasses
in the Sewing Studio.

This is a pattern that will allow you to make
accessories in the Sewing Studio.
